msg: o Finally adding the dependency on Ant 1.5
With this change all jelly scripts that refer to Ant tasks may use the new features/bugs in Ant 1.5 - hopefully that is a good thing. No longer do we need to be Ant 1.4.1 compatible.
o The dependency on commons-grant has also been removed.
